definitions: a person who habitually gets out of bed at a particular time of the morning

examples.text: late risers always exasperate early risers

shortDefinitions: person who habitually gets out of bed at particular time of morning

definitions: a vertical section between the treads of a staircase

examples.text: make risers low and treads deep

shortDefinitions: vertical section between treads of staircase

definitions: a vertical pipe for the upward flow of liquid or gas

examples.text: this pressure carries water through the risers to the upper floors
the main gas riser there was relocated

shortDefinitions: vertical pipe for upward flow of liquid or gas

definitions: a low platform on a stage or in an auditorium, used to give greater prominence to a speaker or performer

examples.text: he fell backwards off the riser
half a drum riser collapsed during my solo

shortDefinitions: low platform on stage or in auditorium

definitions: a strip of webbing joining the harness and the rigging lines of a parachute or paraglider

examples.text: constantly adjust the risers to keep the wing overhead

shortDefinitions: strip of webbing joining harness and rigging lines of parachute or paraglider
